document.full_text: jalen rose's recent comment that he considered black duke players like grant hill "uncle toms" was insulting to everyone at the school, coach mike krzyzewski said tuesday.
document.title: coach k: rose comment in documentary 'insulting'
lines_and_colors: jalen rose's recent comment that he considered black duke players like grant hill "uncle toms" was insulting to everyone at the school, coach mike krzyzewski said tuesday.
